This message reports the precise GLO time of the most recent navigation solution includingvalidity flags and an accuracy estimate.

column6: GPS time of week of the navigation epoch.See the description of iTOW for details.
GLONASS time of day (rounded to integerseconds)
Fractional part of TOD (range: +/-500000000).The precise GLONASS time of day in seconds is:TOD + fTOD * 1e-9
Current date (range: 1-1461), starting at 1 fromthe 1st Jan of the year indicated by N4 andending at 1461 at the 31st Dec of the third yearafter that indicated by N4
